name: Foreign R&D paid for by the company and others and performed by the company, by type of R&D, industry, and company size: 2021
description: Foreign R&D paid for by the company and others and performed by the company, by type of R&D, industry, and company size: 2021

creator.name: National Center for Science and Engineering Statistics

variableMeasured.name: field_total_foreign_r_d_performance_total
variableMeasured.description: Total Foreign R D Performance Total

variableMeasured.name: field_total_foreign_r_d_performance_paid_for_by_the_company
variableMeasured.description: Total Foreign R D Performance Paid For By The Company

variableMeasured.name: field_total_foreign_r_d_performance_paid_for_by_others
variableMeasured.description: Total Foreign R D Performance Paid For By Others

variableMeasured.name: field_research_basic_and_applied_paid_for_by_the_company
variableMeasured.description: Research Basic And Applied Paid For By The Company

variableMeasured.name: field_research_basic_and_applied_paid_for_by_others
variableMeasured.description: Research Basic And Applied Paid For By Others

variableMeasured.name: field_development_paid_for_by_the_company
variableMeasured.description: Development Paid For By The Company

specialValues.D: suppressed to avoid disclosure of confidential information

notes: Detail may not add to total because of rounding. Industry classification is based on the dominant business code for domestic R&D performance, where available. For companies that did not report business codes, the classification used for sampling was assigned. Statistics are representative of companies located in the United States that performed or funded $50,000 or more of R&D and are not comparable with estimates published for years prior to 2018. An estimate range may be displayed in place of a single estimate to avoid disclosing operations of individual companies.
sources: National Center for Science and Engineering Statistics and Census Bureau, Business Enterprise Research and Development Survey, 2021.
